name: Road Warriors: Biker Brawl
description:
--CONTROLS--

--1P Controls:

WSAD/ARROW KEYS-MOVE

QE/ZX-UP/DOWN ATTACK

R/C-NEXT WEAPON

SPACE-BOOST

--2P Controls:

IKJL-MOVE

UO-UP/DOWN ATTACK

Y-NEXT WEPON

H-BOOST

--MISC CONTROLS:

ESC-PAUSE

BACKSPACE-QUIT

M-MUTE AUDIO

TAB-HUD ON/OFF

--DESCRIPTION--

Side-scrolling beat-em-up on bikes!
